title: Anomaly Warzone Earth
description: The award-winning Anomaly Warzone Earth comes to Xbox Live Arcade, with loads of exclusive XBLA content! Experience the innovative Tower Offense formula where you are the attacking side. Be captivated by a new approach to strategy designed specifically for gamepad. Take on the role of the Commander whose special abilities are crucial in the quest for victory. Manage your armor squad's tactics – choose your formation and plot your course. Gather resources for new units and upgrades. Jump into a variety of modes – story campaign and two Squad Assault Modes. Become the strategy master by solving puzzles in Xbox-exclusive Tactical Trials levels. Enjoy extraordinary mixture of strategy and action packaged in great visuals and atmospheric sound!

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Anomaly Warzone Earth - Trial
childDownloads.description: The award-winning Anomaly Warzone Earth comes to Xbox Live Arcade, with loads of exclusive XBLA content! Thanks to its innovative Tower Offense formula, it’s an extraordinary mixture of action and real-time strategy perfectly suited to the Xbox 360. Highlights: - Tower Offense gameplay – You’re the attacking side - New approach to strategy – RTS natively designed for the gamepad - Commander’s special abilities – Crucial in the quest for victory - Tactics management – Form your squad and plan your route - Gathering resources – Unlock new units and upgrades - Variety of modes – Story campaign and two Squad Assault Modes - Xbox-exclusive Tactical Trials mode - Great visuals and atmospheric audio
